text: The Senshu Bank, Ltd. (株式会社泉州銀行; Kabushikigaisha Senshu Ginkō) is a Japanese bank, headquartered in Kishiwada with 63 branches. It is involved in loaning, credit cards, leasing, and the development and sale of computer software. It is traded on the Osaka Securities Exchange under symbol 8372. ==History== The bank was founded in 1951. ==Shareholders== *Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group *The Bank of Tokyo-Mitsubishi UFJ ==External links== *The Senshu Bank website (in Japanese) *Google Finance.com: The Senshu Bank financial information Category:Regional banks of Japan Category:Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Category:Banks established in 1951 Category:Japanese companies established in 1951 zh:泉州银行
title: The Senshu Bank
